entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 8 except 15 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny this afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High 8 except 15 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1 except 6 near the Trans-Canada Highway. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light overnight. Low plus 1 except 6 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 3 except 8 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
